title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Ninety Six National Historic Site Visitor Center in Spring. Ninety Six National Historic Site  Visit Ninety Six National Historic Site & see what History & Nature have to offer.     CURRENT HOURS Effective  9.29.13    The Visitor Center will be CLOSED on Mondays and Tuesdays. Wednesdays - Sundays, the Visitor Center will be OPEN from 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM. The Star Fort Pond and parking lot will be CLOSED from 9:00 AM Sundays - 9:00 AM Tuesdays.  Park Grounds are open daily, dawn to dusk. Restrooms and Gates close at 5:00 PM. Also closed on the following holidays: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day.   The new operating hours will remain in effect UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.        Historic Log House in Spring Ninety Six National Historic Site  Historic Log House: The Log House is only open on special occasions & during Living History events.       Available Facilities: Begin your park visit at the Visitor Center. Here you will find information on Ninety Six National Historic Site. Rangers and Volunteers at the information desk will gladly help you with answers and assistance. The Visitor Center offers and exhibit gallery and a 20-minute live-action film, "Ninety Six: Crossroads of a Revolution." The film is shown on request. The Visitor Center also offers a bookstore operated by Eastern National.
